content: ** see the micaela bikini top pattern here 1 ** shorts sizes s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl materials drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250-300-300-350-350-400 g color 29 old pink drops crochet hook size 4 mm / g/6 or the size needed to get 18 double crochets and 9 row on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/178-74-a-micaela-bikini-top
